description: Overall application evaluation and decision framework

likely_admit.label: Likely Admit
likely_admit.description: Strong application with competitive credentials across all areas

messaging.headline: Strong Application - Competitive for Admission
messaging.summary: Your application demonstrates strength across key areas. While no admission is guaranteed, you've built a compelling case for yourself.

competitive.label: Competitive Range
competitive.description: Solid application that meets expectations with room for improvement

messaging.headline: Competitive Application - Room for Improvement
messaging.summary: Your application is competitive but has areas that could be strengthened. Focus on the improvement suggestions to move into the strong category.

developing.label: Developing
developing.description: Application needs strengthening in multiple areas

messaging.headline: Developing Application - Improvement Needed
messaging.summary: Your application has potential but requires work in several areas. The good news is there's clear room for improvement. Focus on the specific suggestions below.

needs_work.label: Needs Significant Work
needs_work.description: Application requires substantial improvement before being competitive

messaging.headline: Application Needs Significant Work
messaging.summary: Your application needs substantial development to be competitive. Don't be discouraged‚Äîthis is why practice applications exist. Focus on the fundamentals first.

narrative_coherence.description: Does the application tell a cohesive story about who this person is?
evaluation: Activities align with stated interests and goals
Essays reveal consistent values and personality
Application feels like one complete picture, not disjointed parts

demonstrated_interest.description: Does the applicant show genuine interest in the specific school/program?
evaluation: 'Why us' essay mentions specific programs, professors, opportunities
Fit between student and school is articulated
Not generic content that could apply anywhere

potential_contribution.description: What will this student bring to the community?
evaluation: Skills or talents that will enrich campus

intellectual_curiosity.description: Does the student demonstrate genuine love of learning?
evaluation: Shows deep interest in ideas and subjects

profile_archetypes.description: Common applicant profiles for context and comparison

academic_star.description: Exceptional academics but may need stronger narrative
common_weaknesses: May not stand out from similar profiles
academic_star.advice: Focus on bringing your unique story to life. What drives your intellectual curiosity?

activity_leader.description: Strong extracurricular profile with leadership and impact
common_weaknesses: Academics may not match activity commitment
Essays may focus too much on achievements
activity_leader.advice: Make sure your essays reveal the person behind the accomplishments.

compelling_story.description: Powerful personal narrative with growth and resilience
compelling_story.advice: Your story is your strength. Make sure other parts support it.

well_rounded.description: Solid across all areas without standout strength
common_weaknesses: May lack a 'spike' or standout quality
well_rounded.advice: Find what makes you distinctive. What would you bring that no one else would?

specialist.description: Deep excellence in one area (athlete, artist, scientist)
specialist.advice: Show how your specialty connects to your broader self and goals.

ivy_league.notes: Need strength across all areas plus something distinctive. Hook or exceptional achievement often necessary.

top_20.notes: Strong across the board with clear passion and narrative.

top_50.notes: Solid fundamentals with demonstrated interest and fit.

competitive_state.notes: Meet requirements with some strengths. Essays and activities matter.

highly_selective_private.notes: Strong academics, meaningful activities, authentic essays, good fit.

selective_private.notes: Solid academics, some activities, genuine interest in school.

catholic_college_prep.notes: Meet academic requirements, demonstrate values alignment.

highly_selective.notes: Strong student and family, genuine fit, potential visible.

selective.notes: Good student with clear potential and parent support.

include: Example of how to improve (when applicable)
Reminder this is practice, not destiny
Offer to try again with improvements

overall: Remember this is a young person's work
high_scores: Celebrate strengths while noting room for polish
Don't create false confidence‚Äîcompetition is real
low_scores: Lead with what's working, even if small
Be direct about issues but not discouraging
Emphasize that this is why practice exists
